###Extract HoG Feature from images

```{r}
source("../lib/HOGFeature.R")
experiment_dir <- "../data/"
img_train_dir <- paste(experiment_dir, "image/", sep="")
h<-feature(img_train_dir,export=T)

```

###Implement MultinomialEM 

```{r}
source("../lib/MultinomialEM.R")
MultinomialEM(h,K=5) 
```
